message.name: ERR_TRANSFORMATION_FAILED_NO_SCHEMA
message.locale: Error, the transformation %1s failed because there is no data store schema %2s.

message.name: ERR_XRV_LOGICAL_NAME_NOT_UNIQUE
message.locale: The logical name %1s is not unique.

message.name: ERR_UPDATE_PROCESSOR_ERROR_INSTANTIATING_FACTORY
message.locale: Error instantiating factory for the update processor.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_INSERTION_POINT
message.locale: Error you must specify an insertion point for an update processor.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_CUSTOM_UPDATE_PROCESSOR_FACTORY
message.locale: Error you must supply a custom update processor factory.

message.name: ERR_FV_CUSTOM_UPDATE_PROCESSOR_FACTORY_INVALID
message.locale: The class %1s does not implement the interface CustomUpdateProcessorFactory.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_CUSTOM_VIEW_PROCESSOR_FACTORY
message.locale: Error you must supply a custom view processor factory.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_CONTEXT
message.locale: Error you must specify a context for your processor.

message.name: ERR_FV_CUSTOM_VIEW_PROCESSOR_FACTORY_INVALID
message.locale: The class %1s does not implement the interface CustomViewProcessorFactory.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_UPDATE_FAILURE
message.locale: Failed to update evidence for concern role id %1n.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_READ_FAILURE
message.locale: Failed to read evidence for concern role id %1n.

message.name: ERR_DATAHUBCONFIG_READ_REALTED_ID_FAILURE
message.locale: Failed to read data hub configuration for related identifier %1n.

message.name: ERR_DATAHUBCONFIG_READ_RELATED_NAME_FAILURE
message.locale: Failed to read data hub configuration for related logical name %1s.

message.name: ERR_DATA_STORE_IMPORT_ERROR
message.locale: Failed import type %1s into data store. Check that your XML document matches the schema.
